title: Rebirth of a CV Star - Novel Updates
tags: Celebrities   Handsome Male Lead   Hard-Working Protagonist   Modern Day   Multiple Transported Individuals   Previous Life Talent   Showbiz   Transmigration   Voice Actors
author: 廿乱
description:
Yan Mu Lin, who just got the Best Male CV (Character Voice) award, was killed in an accident, but fate made him traverse into another world.

In there, he has more opportunities to showcase his talent. His goal is…

Shao Nuo Yu: to assist his husband and educate the children.

Yan Mu Lin: ……

The otakus who loved to express their shock and regret:  （ ⊙ o ⊙ ）

Pan Jinlian‘s CV is actually male, male, male……

Lin Daiyu‘s CV is actually male, male, male……

Daji‘s CV is actually male, male, male……

The drama/movie fans who loved to express their astonishment:  （*@ο@*）

X superstar’s voice in this TV drama is super sexy~~

X film emperor’s voice in this movie sounds really distressed~~

X female lead’s voice in this movie sounds really heartbroken~~

They found out that the superstar, film emperor, and female lead unexpectedly had the same CV!

In the end, who is it?! Who is it?!>
